s.text: William Kristol and Robert Kagan say that the U.S. should remove Hussein and his regime from power.
The WP , NYT , and USAT go front-page with the bombing yesterday at an Alabama abortion clinic that killed an off-duty police officer working there as a security guard.

Jones' lawyers were disappointed, being left in the position, observes the NYT , of not being able to use evidence their case helped flush out.
